exam1.proxy

类 ProxyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • exam1.proxy.ProxyClient

  • public class ProxyClient
extends java.lang.Object
    通过HttpClient修改，完成代理服务器作为客户端的GET操作
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Patchouli

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private byte[] buffer
      Response is stored in a byte array.
      private static int buffer_size
      Allow a maximum buffer size of 8192 bytes
      private static java.lang.String CRLF
      String to represent the Carriage Return and Line Feed character sequence.
      private java.lang.StringBuffer header 
      (专用程序包) java.io.BufferedInputStream istream 
      (专用程序包) java.io.BufferedOutputStream ostream 
      private java.net.Socket proxySocket
      My socket to the world.
      private java.lang.StringBuffer response

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close all open connections -- sockets and streams.
      void connect(java.lang.String host, int port)
      connect connects to the input host on the port This function opens the socket and creates the input and output streams used for communication.
      java.lang.String getHeader()
      Get the response header.
      java.lang.String getResponse()
      Get the server's response.
      void processGetRequest(java.lang.String request, java.lang.String host)
      processGetRequest process the input GET request.
      void processResponse()
      processResponse process the server response.

    • 方法详细资料

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    int port)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        connect connects to the input host on the port This function opens the socket and creates the input and output streams used for communication.
        参数:
        host - 连接主机
        port - 连接端口
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processGetRequest

        public void processGetRequest(java.lang.String request,
                              java.lang.String host)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        processGetRequest process the input GET request.
        参数:
        request - 请求信息
        host - 主机地址
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processResponse

        public void processResponse()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        processResponse process the server response.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader()
        Get the response header.

        public java.lang.String getResponse()
        Get the server's response.

           throws java.lang.Exception
